entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
